message: Hi Bob, I propose a fair split where I get $5500 and you get $4500. With the 5% inflation affecting me each round, waiting would hurt my position. This is a reasonable offer that gives both of us a substantial amount.

Hi Alice, I propose an even split where we each get $5000. This ensures fairness for both of us, and although inflation affects us differently, this division leaves us with equal halves of the original amount.
